summary:
Professional Interests and Experience:
-	Electrophysiology: Experience in the investigation and management of invasive and non-invasive electrophysiology and cardiac devices.
-	Atrial fibrillation ablation: Experience in point by point WACA with Carto and Ensite 3D mapping systems, as well as pulmonary vein cryo-ablation.
-	Diagnosis (both non-invasive and invasive) and ablation of supraventricular arrhythmias, including (macro-reentrant and focal) atrial tachycardias.
-	Ventricular tachycardia ablation: Experience in PVC ablation and VT ablation in ischemic and non-ischemic heart disease.
-	Cardiac devices implantation: Experience in the implantation and programming of implantable loop recorder, pacemaker, ICD, and CRT-P/D devices, as well as implantation of Boston Scientific subcutaneous ICD.
-	Clinical: Experience in Cardiology and Internal Medicine.
-	Scientific research: Experience in the field of basic mechanisms of cardiac arrhythmias: electrophysiology, electrocardiography, echocardiography, cardiac microsurgery on rodents, molecular research techniques (protein analysis, immunohistochemistry, PCR techniques, etc).
-	Education: Experience in academic teaching in the field of Cardiovascular Physiology (biomedical sciences and medical students).

education.field_of_study: "Arrhythmogenesis in the remodeled heart. The role of spatially dispersed Cx43 expression"
Exam subjects: Dutch, English, Latin, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics A, Mathematics B, Physics
